translation.src: </s> There is no doubt that the subject of keeping animals in zoos creates a lot of debate .
translation.tgt: There is no doubt that the subject of keeping animals in zoos creates a lot of debate .

translation.src: </s> Some people say zoos are traditional family entertainment and good for animals .
translation.tgt: Some people say zoos are traditional family entertainment and good for animals .

translation.src: </s> Others say keeping animals in zoos is cruel and inhumane .
translation.tgt: Others say keeping animals in zoos is cruel and inhumane .

translation.src: </s> One advantage of zoos is that they give people the chance to see and learn about animals .
translation.tgt: One advantage of zoos is that they give people the chance to see and learn about animals .

translation.src: </s> This makes people more likely to want to look after animals and protect their natural habitats .
translation.tgt: This makes people more likely to want to look after animals and protect their natural habitats .

translation.src: <extra_id_0> M: which </s> Due to the interest in protecting animals , people are eager to take part in organizations such as World Wide Fund for Nature ( WWF ) <extra_id_0> is an international non - governmental organization working on issues regarding the conservation , research and restoration of the environment .
translation.tgt: Due to the interest in protecting animals , people are eager to take part in organizations such as World Wide Fund for Nature ( WWF ) , which is an international non - governmental organization working on issues regarding the conservation , research and restoration of the environment .

translation.src: </s> Another positive aspect of zoos is that they help to protect endangered species by offering them a safe place to live .
translation.tgt: Another positive aspect of zoos is that they help to protect endangered species by offering them a safe place to live .

translation.src: </s> In addition , zoos help to find mates for endangered species .
translation.tgt: In addition , zoos help to find mates for endangered species .

translation.src: </s> For example , many pandas would not find a mate to breed with if they were on their own in the wild .
translation.tgt: For example , many pandas would not find a mate to breed with if they were on their own in the wild .

translation.src: </s> On the other hand , there are many arguments against keeping animals in zoos .
translation.tgt: On the other hand , there are many arguments against keeping animals in zoos .

translation.src: </s> Firstly , zoo animals often suffer from stress and boredom when they are not in their natural habitat .
translation.tgt: Firstly , zoo animals often suffer from stress and boredom when they are not in their natural habitat .

translation.src: </s> Secondly , unwanted animals are sometimes sold to circuses , hunting parks or for meat .

translation.src: </s> Many people have the impression that learning a language is only possible through hard work : studying grammar rules , learning vocabulary by heart and burying your head in a book .
translation.tgt: Many people have the impression that learning a language is only possible through hard work : studying grammar rules , learning vocabulary by heart and burying your head in a book .

translation.src: </s> However , there are in fact several methods that you can employ should you want to become a linguist .
translation.tgt: However , there are in fact several methods that you can employ should you want to become a linguist .

translation.src: </s> In this essay I will discuss two of these : the immersion method , and the classroom method .
translation.tgt: In this essay I will discuss two of these : the immersion method , and the classroom method .

translation.src: </s> Firstly , the immersion method takes its inspiration from the way in which we all learnt to speak our nature tongue : implicitly .
translation.tgt: Firstly , the immersion method takes its inspiration from the way in which we all learnt to speak our nature tongue : implicitly .

translation.src: </s> With this method , learners are simply exposed to the target language , either by going abroad to live in the country where it is spoken , or by having a native teacher .
translation.tgt: With this method , learners are simply exposed to the target language , either by going abroad to live in the country where it is spoken , or by having a native teacher .

translation.src: </s> There is no explicit focus on grammar ; instead , the learners are expected to " absorb " the language and its rules .
translation.tgt: There is no explicit focus on grammar ; instead , the learners are expected to " absorb " the language and its rules .

translation.src: </s> This method has its advantages , as it is the way we all learnt to speak , and so it is arguably more natural .
translation.tgt: This method has its advantages , as it is the way we all learnt to speak , and so it is arguably more natural .

translation.src: </s> Another advantage is that students are unencumbered by overcomplicated , confusing metalanguage .
translation.tgt: Another advantage is that students are unencumbered by overcomplicated , confusing metalanguage .

translation.src: </s> Secondly , the classroom method is the one with which most students ( especially if they are older ) are familiar .
translation.tgt: Secondly , the classroom method is the one with which most students ( especially if they are older ) are familiar .

translation.src: </s> Learners are normally taught in their mother tongue , and are given grammar rules , which they then apply to the language they are learning .
translation.tgt: Learners are normally taught in their mother tongue , and are given grammar rules , which they then apply to the language they are learning .

translation.src: </s> This method also has its benefits , not least logistically speaking , since many students do n't have access to native speakers or are not able to travel abroad .
translation.tgt: This method also has its benefits , not least logistically speaking , since many students do n't have access to native speakers or are not able to travel abroad .

translation.src: <extra_id_0> R: make </s> Furthermore , some learners respond better to an explicit focus on rules , which <extra_id_0> them aware of the mistakes they are making .
translation.tgt: Furthermore , some learners respond better to an explicit focus on rules , which makes them aware of the mistakes they are making .

translation.src: </s> While both methods clearly have their advantages , I believe that just limiting students to either one or the other can have a negative effect on language learning .
translation.tgt: While both methods clearly have their advantages , I believe that just limiting students to either one or the other can have a negative effect on language learning .

translation.src: </s> Having a native speaker will give students maximum exposure to the language , while at the same time a focus on rules will give them the tools for self - correction and self - study .
translation.tgt: Having a native speaker will give students maximum exposure to the language , while at the same time a focus on rules will give them the tools for self - correction and self - study .

translation.src: <extra_id_0> R: combination </s> I fully believe that this <extra_id_0> method is the most effective way for students to learn English .
translation.tgt: I fully believe that this combined method is the most effective way for students to learn English .
